title: Bitcoin ETF applicants will have to ‘bend the knee’ on cash redemption model
description:
The SEC is pushing Bitcoin ETF issuers down the cash create route for creation and redemptions, but BlackRock has other ideas.

As spot Bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF) issuers iron out details of their filings with the U.S. securities regulator, it appears that the SEC is steadfast in demanding a “cash” redemption model rather than alternative model proposed by other issuers, such as BlackRock.

On Dec. 14 finance lawyer Scott Johnsson said that ETF applicant Invesco has become the latest to bend the knee to using a cash creation and redemption model for its ETF. 

Seyffart also noted that Bitwise has been set for cash-only creates/redeems since Dec. 4, “though for months they had in-kind or cash in their documents before this.”

Read more

title: Smart AI Model Boosts Heart Checks – Finding Heartbeat Issues Made Easy
description: Researchers at Scripps Research have unveiled an AI model poised to revolutionize the screening process for atrial fibrillation (AFib). This heart condition, characterized by irregular and rapid heartbeats, poses a significant risk of stroke and heart failure. The newly developed AI model showcases the potential to identify subtle variations in normal heartbeats, providing a more […]

title: Brian May Proclaims 2023 as the Last Year of Human Songwriting in the Era of AI Dominance
description: legendary Queen guitarist and astrophysicist Brian May predicts that 2023 will mark the culmination of an era where discerning whether a song was crafted by a human or artificial intelligence (AI) becomes nearly impossible. May explores the growing importance of AI in the music industry in a conversation with Rosie Bennet for the Fret Not […]
